file_content.text: I'll have that factory running in no time. Count on it.
I heard the explosion from here. I'm guessing every bog-rat on Hutta heard it. That was amazing work.
True.
It was nothing.
Really saved my skin, too. Nem'ro the Exculpating he may be, but only to a point, you know?
I already regret it.
Well, I guess I'm glad you wasted it on me, then. You helped me out of a big scrape.
I'm pretty handy with a wrench, you know. If you're ever in town and need something fixed up, I'll be your guy.
Past the retaining wall, all the way up the hill and across the pipes. Don't fall!
Workers overheard the bog-rats talking about their ship. Can you believe it? Bog-rats flying?
Apparently, they landed on the factory roof, but they're having mechanical trouble. How'd you like to blow up the first and last Evocii starship?
It will be a historic moment.
Blowing up ships isn't easy.
I got a stick of detonite here that'll take a little ship out, no problem. Just make sure you stand way back.
Path to the factory roof is no joke, though. Go past that retaining wall, up the hill, then walk real careful-like across the pipes leading into the factory.
Then storm the place, blow up the bog-rat ship and come back. No problem.
I'm done here. [Refuse quest]
Yeah, okay. We got the workers out anyway.
You did it. Got the whole group of them out. And now I know how the Evocii got into the factory in the first place!
Upstairs for the console, then down for the hostages.
Can't help noticing you're out here and not in your factory.
This is Nem'ro's core plant. His most important asset. Now some crazy Evocii appeared out of nowhere and took the place over.
One minute, they weren't there; the next, they were. I managed to get out, but the bog-rats took most of my workers hostage.
You want to save me from charging into a crowd of angry Evocii with nothing but a stick of detonite and a bolt gun?
I can take care of a few Evocii, no problem.
Evocii? Sounds easy.
That's a relief. Save me trying to rig a catapult out of these sludge pumps.
Those Evocii would've killed you. You should've looked for a professional.
You didn't just hire someone?
No time. Nem'ro will kill me when he finds out I lost his factory! Don't matter that it's not my fault.
What do you need me to do?
What's the job?
Hostages are in the basement, but you can't go straight there. Need to use the main console to unlock the elevators.
The main console's on the top floor. Get the elevators working, then down to the basement and free my workers, yeah?
I'm in.
We'll see--no promises.
Remember, upstairs first. Elevators won't work until they're unlocked.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
All right, then. I guess it's Plan B. Gotta be some old tires and a blast furnace control mechanism around here somewhere....
I'm sorry. I'm a little busy right now.
I'm sorry. I'm a little busy right now.
